forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, with a promise of pleasant temperatures that will gently dip as the afternoon progresses. The air is fresh, carrying with it a delicate breeze from the northwest, adding a touch of briskness to the atmosphere. While the iconic Golden Gate Bridge stands resilient, it remains free from the usual draping of fog, allowing the city to bask in clarity and warmth. As the day marches on, a soft cloud cover might flirt with the sunshine, but nothing seems threatening to dampen the spirit of this lovely day.

As evening approaches, the air will cool to a comfortable 48 degrees, beckoning a light layer for those venturing out. It’s a good moment to slip into something soft and cozy—perhaps a light jacket or cardigan—perfect for a contemplative stroll along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the bustling cafés that dot the Union Square. The city offers a canvas of understated allure, where one might simply enjoy the earthy aroma of roasted coffee mingling with a hint of the bay, or find small treasures in the local shops, each tailored with care and charm. The crisp air invites creativity and intention, encouraging all to embrace the simple pleasures of the day.
